import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { searchTerm: string = ''; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} search(searchTerm: string) { console.log('Arama terimi:', searchTerm); } }
